alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Custer Co Plains; Eastern Fall River; Hermosa Foothills; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Foothills; Southern Jackson; Western Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued December 07 at 2:27AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...Very High to Extreme Fire Danger is expected today. Mild temperatures, combined with dry conditions and gusty winds, will create elevated fire weather conditions. Gusts of 50 to 60+ mph are expected, especially across southwestern SD. Winds will diminish overnight, but breezy winds are expected again on Friday and Saturday. Elevated fire weather conditions will continue. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Friday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the high category to very high category.
